Header.title: Brazilian Carrot Cake
Header.paragraph: Check out ingredients and how to bake this classic brazilian cake!

About.paragraph: The Brazilian carrot cake, or "bolo de cenoura" in Portuguese, is one of the most traditional Brazilian cake recipes. The chocolate ganache on top is key to this recipe. We would tipically eat it in the afternoon with a cup of coffee. But today we are adapting it to Pride Afternoon Tea! Grab a cuppa and enjoy it!
